mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.category_id AS productCategoryId, p.price AS productPrice, p.number AS productNumber, p.image AS productImage, c.amount, c.total FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id=p.id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT c.id, c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.category_id AS productCategoryId, p.price AS productPrice, p.number AS productNumber, p.image AS productImage, c.amount, c.total FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id=p.id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} AND c.product_id=#{productId}
